content.description:
Instamus tamen immemores caecique furore

et monstrum infelix sacrata sistimus arce.

Tunc etiam fatis aperit Cassandra futuris

ora dei iussu non umquam credita Teucris.

(5) Nos delubra deum miseri, quibus ultimus esset

ille dies, festa velamus fronde per urbem.

Aeneid 2.244-249

Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question.
content.question: To what specifically does monstrum infelix (line 2) refer?

frqParts.text: To what specifically does monstrum infelix (line 2) refer?
